text: Love the new iPhone! Battery lasts all day and camera is amazing.
The latest iPad update crashed my device twice already.
Apple Watch notifications are helpful but sometimes overwhelming.d updates are so fast and smooth
Google Pixel camera quality is impressive and easy to use.Maps keeps crashing on my phone.
Android updates are slow and cause apps to crash frequently.e Watch is fantastic for fitness tracking.
Google Assistant is convenient but sometimes misunderstands commands.ointed with Google Assistant not understanding me.
AirPods are fantastic for workouts and calls.
Disappointed with Google Maps misrouting me multiple times.
iPhone screen cracked easily after a small drop. Very frustrating.
Neutral experience with Google Drive; works as expected.
